definition: Nian Army, leading a peasant rebellion against the Qing dynasty in Shandong, Henan, Jiangsu and Anhui 1851-1868, at the same time as the Taiping Rebellion further south

sentences.english: Shandong local community undergone a change after the Nien was to be put down.
sentences.chinese: 山東地方社會在平定捻軍後經歷着一場變革。

sentences.english: The siege campaign on Yingzhou was a major warfare in the Nian Army's history.
sentences.chinese: 潁州圍城戰役是捻軍史上的重大戰事。
